name: Add a Mailchimp subcriber & send an Email or create an Asana task & save a file to a Google Drive folder from Airtable
description:
The template works with the following [Airtable base](https://airtable.com/shruEPIPJZVXf2tAY). The scenario is triggered when the 'Preliminary status' field is updated. To achieve that, we created the 'Last modified' field of type 'Last modified time' and chose to watch updates in the 'Preliminary status' field only.

Use this template to automatically add a new Mailchimp subscriber and send an Email if the job applicant (see the Airtable base) is not suitable, and create an Asana task and upload the resume to a Google Drive folder if the applicant is suitable.
